title: Saving Life
sinopse: Haruhiko can't stand his tyrannical father, so he leaves home. The life of a super-rich high school student is difficult. By relying on his relatives, he ended up with a large debt... Even with his classmate Yoriko and his maid Nanako helping him out, things just keep happening in his unfamiliar economic lifestyle. It's a promise-filled, high tension, romantic comedy!
